landingPageDescription: Effortlessly create Spotify playlists from your favourite artists' live performances.
whyCreateAccountDescription: Unlock exclusive features by creating an account. Save playlists, recover deleted playlists, and more!
feature1Description: Keep track of your created playlists and access them anytime.
feature2Description: Easily integrate with Spotify and save playlists directly to your account.
feature3Description: Deleting a playlist on Spotify doesn't mean it's gone forever.
